analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/4/0x77a77eca75445841875ebb67a33d0a97dc34d924.sol:
	Contract IEtherToken has payable functions:
	 - deposit (/unique_chucks/4/0x77a77eca75445841875ebb67a33d0a97dc34d924.sol#166)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

BancorBuyer.BancorBuyer (/unique_chucks/4/0x77a77eca75445841875ebb67a33d0a97dc34d924.sol#186-198) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-tokenChanger.getReserveBalance(etherToken) (/unique_chucks/4/0x77a77eca75445841875ebb67a33d0a97dc34d924.sol#196-198)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/4/0x77a77eca75445841875ebb67a33d0a97dc34d924.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.11 (/unique_chucks/4/0x77a77eca75445841875ebb67a33d0a97dc34d924.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/4/0x77a77eca75445841875ebb67a33d0a97dc34d924.sol#44) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_token' of TokenHolder.withdrawTokens (/unique_chucks/4/0x77a77eca75445841875ebb67a33d0a97dc34d924.sol#121) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_to' of TokenHolder.withdrawTokens (/unique_chucks/4/0x77a77eca75445841875ebb67a33d0a97dc34d924.sol#121-122) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_amount' of TokenHolder.withdrawTokens (/unique_chucks/4/0x77a77eca75445841875ebb67a33d0a97dc34d924.sol#122-123) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_changer' of BancorBuyer.BancorBuyer (/unique_chucks/4/0x77a77eca75445841875ebb67a33d0a97dc34d924.sol#186-188) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_etherToken' of BancorBuyer.BancorBuyer (/unique_chucks/4/0x77a77eca75445841875ebb67a33d0a97dc34d924.sol#188) is not in mixedCase
